en.title: Hugo Martini√®re - Website
en.hero-description: Data Analyst, Data Scientist, Data Engineer
en.description: I am a data scientist passionate about data analysis.
en.about-description: Hello, I'm Hugo Martini√®re, a Data Scientist finishing his Master's degree in August 2025. Passionate about data exploration, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, I'm looking for my next opportunity in an innovate and collaborative environment. I invite you to explore my website where I share my projects, skills, and interests. Enjoy your visit!
en.experience-1-description: Extraction, analysis, execution, and automation of statistical studies on millions of data points. Presentation and simplification of results to business teams. Updating of scoring indicators. Use of SQL, Python, and Spark
en.experience-2-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-2-description: Deepening of advanced techniques in artificial intelligence, particularly Machine Learning and Deep Learning for predictive modeling and neural network training
en.experience-3-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-3-description: Analysis and comparison of physical success criteria between Ligue 1 and Ligue 2 over two years to optimize the club's transfer market strategies. The project, in collaboration with Stade Lavallois Mayenne FC, focused on over twenty performance criteria and nearly 1000 matches, with data preprocessing, analysis, and modeling done using Python
en.experience-4-role: Master's Degree 1 in Data Science and Statistical Modeling
en.experience-4-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-4-description: Specialization in statistical modeling: Generalized Linear Models, Time Series, Bayesian Statistics, Monte Carlo Method, Duration Models, and Survival Analysis
en.experience-5-role:
Bachelor's Degree in Mathematics, 
Computer Science, Statistics
en.experience-5-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-5-description: Deepening of statistical theory, hypothesis testing, factor analysis, and classification and clustering methods, as well as strengthening computer science skills, particularly in database management and optimization
en.experience-6-description: Creation of various vulnerability indices for the Rennes metropolitan area, automation of dashboards, and presentation of results to business teams
en.experience-7-description: Database design and management, querying, data analysis and visualization, web development, and programming
en.project-1-title: Ligue 1 vs Ligue 2: What Are the Athletic Differences?
en.project-1-description: For the Stade Levallois FC, I identified the athletic differences between the top two divisions of French football, Ligue 1 and Ligue 2. Additionally, I modeled the athletic perfomrance of the teams and their final season ranking
en.project-2-description: I modeled the price gap between the Intraday market and the SPOT market (the electricity market where transactions are made for next-day delivery) to forecast its fluctuations in the coming days.
en.project-3-description: In the context of growing ambulatory care, I compared the complication risks within 30 days of ambulatory hospitalization versus traditional hospitalization to determine if ambulatory care presented an increased risk.
en.project-4-description: I modeled the rates for two insurance covers: (i) damage coverage, which protects against material loss due to accidents, and (ii) glass breakage coverage, which covers damage to glass surfaces, to better understand the criteria influencing the setting of these rates.
en.project-5-description: In order to understand the factors driving penalty success, I compared the performances of penalty takers during the 2019-2020 season of the five major European leagues, considering various factors such as the taker's identity, the importance of the penalty, the period of the game, etc.
en.testimonial-1-text: Rigorous, conscientious, and committed, Mr. Martini√®re has provided significant support to our ongoing work and has been able to enhance and apply his skills in software and programming languages such as Access and SQL during this period. Furthermore, he has integrated very well into the APRAS team and has been unanimously appreciated.
en.testimonial-2-text: I had the responsibility of supervising Hugo Martini√®re during his internship at the IUT of Vannes. This experience was very positive. He demonstrated an excellent level of seriousness and autonomy, always completing his tasks with precision. Hugo adapted very well to his work environment and approached his missions professionally. His curiosity and involvement were noticeable, allowing him to make progress in his learning. He also showed very valuable interpersonal qualities. I am convinced that all his qualities will make a positive contribution to his future employer.

en.interet-sport-text: Football and badminton, which I have practiced in a club, are at the heart of my passion for sports.
en.interet-innovation-text: Technological advancements, especially in artificial intelligence, spark my curiosity.
